params._observationsData: Array of tuples containing the dataset
params._poolSalt: Identifier of the pool to fetch

params._pendingGovernor: Address of the proposed new governor

params._isWhitelisted: Array of whitelisting status for each address
params._receiverAdapters: Array of addresses of the adapter

ORACLE_INIT_CODE_HASH.return: The oracle creation code hash used to calculate their address

returns._0: The oracle creation code hash used to calculate their address

deployedOracles.return: The address of the correspondant Oracle

returns._0: The address of the correspondant Oracle

params._adapter: Address of the bridge adapter to consult

whitelistedAdapters.return: Whether a bridge adapter is whitelisted

returns._0: Whether a bridge adapter is whitelisted

ObservationsNotWritable().notice: Thrown when the broadcast nonce is incorrect

OnlyGovernor().notice: Throws if a non-governor user tries to call a OnlyGovernor function

OnlyPendingGovernor().notice: Throws if a non-pending-governor user tries to call a OnlyPendingGovernor function

UnallowedAdapter().notice: Thrown when a not-whitelisted adapter triggers an update

ZeroAddress().notice: Throws if a variable is assigned to the zero address

AdapterWhitelisted(address,bool).notice: Emitted when a new adapter whitelisting rule is set

ObservationsAdded(bytes32,uint24,(uint32.notice: Emitted when a broadcast observation is succesfully processed

PendingGovernorAccepted(address).notice: Emitted when a new governor is set

PendingGovernorSet(address,address).notice: Emitted when a new pending governor is set

acceptPendingGovernor().notice: Allows a proposed governor to accept the governance

addObservations((uint32,int24)[],bytes32.notice: Allows whitelisted bridge adapters to push a broadcast

setPendingGovernor(address).notice: Allows a governor to propose a new governor

whitelistAdapter(address,bool).notice: Allows governance to set an adapter whitelisted state

whitelistAdapters(address[],bool[]).notice: Allows governance to batch set adapters whitelisted state

whitelistedAdapters(address).notice: Tracks the whitelisting of bridge adapters

userdoc.notice: Handles reception of broadcast data and delivers it to correspondant oracle
